text:
essential to ask the woman about her previous pregnancies or obstetric 
history to determine if there were any complications in previous pregnancies. Some complications may recur 
during the present pregnancy. Obtain the following information while taking the obstetric history:
 ∙ Ask about the number of previous pregnancies. Confirm whether they were all live births, and if there was 
any still birth, abortion or any child who died.
